item.title: By: T-Mobile Dash + Android + 3G = Dream Phone » Gadgets, Wishlist » Russell Heimlich

item.description: [...] on T-Mobile! All I want is a Dash form factor running the Android OS with 3G support. Is that too much to ask for? According to tmonews.com’s upcoming phone chart, there is nothing in the pipeline. I guess it [...]

item.title: By: Multifarious Design Links » Design » Russell Heimlich

item.description: [...] G1 tied. Verizon was ranked the best carrier followed by T-Mobile. Sprint was last in most markets. T-Mobile still doesn’t have any 3G phones worth getting excited [...]
